html.head:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href={favicon.url}>

code.html:
{heading}

{@html content}
{#each buttons as button} {button.link.label} {/each}

options.markdown: Quis minim ad officia dolor eiusmod cupidatat labore qui anim dolor cillum anim culpa. Excepteur fugiat elit id qui eu irure ea culpa Lorem nisi do tempor cupidatat consectetur.

code.html:
{heading}

{subheading}

{#each tiers as tier}

{tier.title}

{tier.price.numerator} {tier.price.denominator}
{@html tier.description}
    {#each tier.features as { item, icon }}
  • {item}
    • {/each}
{#if tier.link.label} {tier.link.label} {/if}
{/each}

{heading}

    {#each cards as card}

  • {card.title}

    {@html card.description}
    • {/each}

{#each teasers as teaser}

{teaser.title}

{@html teaser.body}
{#if teaser.link.url} {teaser.link.label} {/if}
{#if teaser.image.url} {/if}
{/each}

{heading}

{subheading} {#if buttons.length > 0}
{#each buttons as button, i} {button.link.label} {/each}
{/if}

{heading}

    {#each cards as card, i}
  1. {i+1}.
    {card.title} {@html card.subtitle}
    2. {/each}
{#if button.link.label} {button.link.label} {/if}

{#each nav as { link }} {link.label} {/each}
Primo Powered
{#each social as { link, icon }} {/each}

options.info: nav items and social links are managed from "Content" (in the toolbar).

code.html:
{heading}

{#each items as item, i (i)}
{#if activeItem === i}
{@html item.description}
{/if}
{/each}

{#if logo.title} {logo.title} {:else if logo.image.url} {/if}
{#each nav as { link }} {link.label} {/each}
{#if logo.title} {logo.title} {:else if logo.image.url} {/if} {#if mobileNavOpen}
{#each site_nav as { link }} {link.label} {/each}
{/if}

options.info: logo and nav links are managed from "Content" in the toolbar

teasers.title: Component section
teasers.body: To edit this component's content, hover over the component and click "edit content". To edit the code, switch the green toggle at the top, hover over the component, and click the "edit code" button.
